# Tender Notice: Snow Removal Services at Parks Canada Collections and Curatorial Centre(Amountice etc particpestact private trader nonsalon

## Solicitation Number

* 5P300-23-0113/A

## Description

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) requires snow and ice control services for the Collections and Curatorial Centre (CCC) located at 555 Av. Des Enterprises, Gatineau, QC.

## Period of Contract/Delivery Date

The Work is to be performed during the period of November 1, 2023 to October 31, 2024 with an option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods.

## Bidder Obligations

* Bidders are required to submit their bid via email or Fax to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca or 1-877-558-2349.
* Bid documents must be sent as email attachments.
* Due to email file size limitations, bidders are advised to send bids in multiple emails properly labeled with the solicitation number, project name, and indicate how many emails are included.
* Bids submitted by links or courriels will not be accepted.

## Site Visit

A site visit is recommended for bidders to familiarize themselves with the CCC and its surroundings. The site visit will be held at 555 Av. des Entreprises, Gatineau, QC on October 6, 2023, at 10:00 AM EDT. Representatives are required to complete a site orientation course found at PX3 (talentlms.com) and email the certificate to bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca by October 4, 2023.

## Important Notes

* Late submissions will not be considered.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiated with suppliers on any procurement.
* Please note that under the National Parks Regulations, all bid documents must be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service.
* All bids must be submitted in either English or French.
